definition: "An adverb that expresses the concept of 'never' or 'at no time'. It is commonly used to indicate the absence of an action or event occurring in the past, present, or future. This word is often employed in negative statements, prohibitions, or to emphasize the impossibility of a certain occurrence."

examples.german: Niemals hätte ich gedacht, dass das passieren würde.
examples.english: Never would I have thought that would happen.

examples.german: Er wird niemals seine Fehler zugeben.
examples.english: He will never admit his mistakes.

examples.german: Niemals zuvor habe ich so etwas Schönes gesehen.
examples.english: Never before have I seen something so beautiful.
I will never forget this moment.
